item.title: Apocalypse Chow in Ho Chi Minh
item.author: Peter E H Quicke,Jamie-Li Rickman,
item.description: It’s breakfast time in Vietnam, the sun’s not up yet but you can hear the clashing of pots and pans and the calling of the street vendors hawking all manner of foods from greasy deep fried spring rolls to crystal clear broths. Families congregate around their tiny matriarchs, little old ladies …
